attributes.additional_details:
It is time that politicians/cabinet ministers who are elected by us - the electorate - do as we have decided as an acceptable solution. We do NOT elect you to do what you may think is a result. We have the final vote. The parliamentary system requires dramatic revision.
I am not prepared to be governed by a bunch of people who promote their careers - irrespective of their personal views/brown envelopes!
We need honest and national agreement to any decision! The words that spring to mind are 'national referendums'!
